amendment.description: Amendment instructs the Secretary of Commerce to give priority to innovation clusters that partner with local Workforce Investment Area Boards.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 52 printed in Part B of House Report 111-479 to instruct the Secretary of Commerce to give priority to innovation clusters that partner with local Workforce Investment Area Boards.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schock amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.
